description: Venus and Will have been having an illicit affair for months while their spouses have been out of town. Today, is the last time they get to have the forbidden sex. They tear into each other and fuck like this truly is the last time they will have sex. They fuck all over the bed, both cumming huge loads twice. This scene is so passionate and intense, the sex so real and intimate you will be rooting for this secret love affair to continue no matter the price....
title: Venus Lux; The Final Affair
